functions.name: getManuallySortFoldersSortOrderData
functions.description: Get sort order data set by the 'Manually sort folders' extension.

events.name: onToolbarClick
events.description: Fires when the user clicks anywhere on the toolbar in the main window.

parameters.name: toolbarId
parameters.description: The ID of the toolbar the user clicked.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The X position of the mouse when the user clicked.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The Y position of the mouse when the user clicked.

events.name: onAnyKeydown
events.description: Fires when the user presses any key in any window.

parameters.name: pressedKey
parameters.description: The key combination that the user pressed.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: The path of the window where the key was pressed.
